header.description: Property. Time/frame info. If header.time is set to 0, the marker will be retransformed into its frame on each timestep. You will receive the pose feedback in the same frame. Otherwise, you might receive feedback in a different frame. For rviz, this will be the current 'fixed frame' set by the user.

pose.description: Property. Initial pose. Also, defines the pivot point for rotations.

name.description: Property. Identifying string. Must be globally unique in the topic that this message is sent through.

scale.description: Property. Scale to be used for default controls (default=1).

menu_entries.description: Property. All menu and submenu entries associated with this marker.

controls.description: Property. List of controls displayed for this marker.
